name: ODRL 2.2 Rule
abstract: A Rule according to the Open Digital Rights Language (ODRL) version 2.2
annotatedSchema:
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
$defs:
  rule:
    type: object
    required:
    - action
    action:
      $ref: '#/$defs/action'
    duty:
      $ref: '#/$defs/rule'
    remedy:
      $ref: '#/$defs/rule'
    target:
      oneOf:
      - type: string
      - type: object
  action:
    oneOf:
    - type: string
    - type: array
      minItems: 1
      items:
        type: string
$ref: '#/$defs/rule'
x-jsonld-extra-terms:
  Action: odrl:Action
  action:
    x-jsonld-type: '@vocab'
    x-jsonld-id: odrl:action
  Duty: odrl:Duty
  duty:
    x-jsonld-type: '@id'
    x-jsonld-id: odrl:duty
  consequence:
    x-jsonld-type: '@id'
    x-jsonld-id: odrl:consequence
  remedy:
    x-jsonld-type: '@id'
    x-jsonld-id: odrl:remedy
  target:
    x-jsonld-type: '@id'
    x-jsonld-id: odrl:target
